your_active_v3_liquidity_positions_will_: Your active v1 liquidity positions will appear here.
check_out_our_v3_lp_walkthrough_and_migr: Check out our v1 LP walkthrough and migration guides.
easily_monitor_and_harvest_your_active_p: Easily monitor and harvest your active positions.
this_will_clear_all_current_information_: This will clear all current information in the table.
custom_built_in_launchpad: Custom-built infrastructure for Venom native public sales
name: Name
how_price_is_determined_content_1: You can contribute VENOM in exchange for WTD and esWTD tokens, which can be claimed 24 hours after the sale ends.
how_price_is_determined_content_2: The tokens you receive will have the exact same value as your VENOM contribution.
how_price_is_determined_content_3: 25,000,000 WTD and 25,000,000 esWTD (out of a 1,000,000,000 total supply) will be allocated to the sale.
how_price_is_determined_content_4: Therefore, the final price will be:
claiming_process_content_1: The public sale will end on Apr 17th - 11am UTC.
claiming_process_content_2: Starting from Apr 18th at 3pm UTC, the purchased tokens can be claimed directly from this page, at the same time as trading begins.
claiming_process_content_3: To align with the long-term objectives of the protocol, 1/2 of the sale will be distributed in esWTD, while the other 1/2 will be in WTD.
three_stages_sale_content_1: This sale will occur in two different stages.
three_stages_sale_content_2: During the first 12 hours, only whitelisted addresses can participate with a guaranteed capped allocation.
three_stages_sale_content_3: During the following 12 hours, only whitelisted addresses can participate with a 5x higher allocation cap.
three_stages_sale_content_4: Starting on June 15th at 11am UTC, other participants can purchase the remaining tokens on a first-come, first-served basis. This stage will last for 48 hours.
allocate_dxpx_here: Allocate dXPX here to earn a share of protocol earnings in the form of real yield.
